programme.desc: Proving Grounds. Jake is enraged when his deckhand falls asleep on night watch, putting the entire crew at risk. Plus, a monster wave hits the Time Bandit. S12, Ep10

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Raw Deal. While Keith and Johnathan test the boundaries of partner fishing, Captain Jake struggles to stay cool with a problematic deckhand. Later, Wild Bill takes one for the team. S12, Ep11

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Settling The Score. Winter kicks into high gear on the Bering Sea. While an unruly deckhand forces captain Sean Dwyer to enforce his dad's law, Keith struggles with new greenhorns. S12, Ep12

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Fire At Sea: Part 1. Alone on the water, days from land, the Northwestern catches fire. On the Time Bandit, a family emergency forces Johnathan to make a desperate move. S12, Ep13

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Rookie Mistakes. With Dan stuck at home, Justin starts the new mining season alone. He is dealt a huge blow when their rich underground mine has been pegged by another miner. S2, Ep1

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Wild Wild West. Justin's excavator has an expensive oil leak. Plus, Col's crew are a man down and the Fire Crew are on a wild goose chase hunting a bounty of fabled fire opal. S2, Ep2

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Going Under. For the Rookies, there's tension as a new partner leads them on a wild goose chase underground. Plus, the Cooke Brothers' season is off to a bad and dangerous start. S2, Ep3

programme.title: Outback Crystal Hunters
programme.desc: Mookaite N Miracles. The Rockhounds need a miracle to turn their season around. Kirsty and Patrick need to find rare Ocean Kyanite crystals to have a chance of recouping their debt. S1, Ep5

programme.title: Outback Crystal Hunters
programme.desc: Thrill Of The Hunt. Pete and Kyle take the biggest gamble of their season, hunting valuable Tourmaline crystals. Hugh and Jarrin tackle the world's only Stitchtite quarry. S1, Ep6

programme.title: Outback Crystal Hunters
programme.desc: Deadly Crocs - Dangerous Air. The Rockhounds hunt a rainforest river system by crocodile-infested waters. Plus, Jarrin and Hugh confront low oxygen levels and crumbling mine walls. S1, Ep7

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Gold Devils leave their main base to return to an old lease. In Western Australia's tropical north, Alan and Salty push their off-road adventure to the limit. S8, Ep14

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: In flooded Victoria, the Poseidon Crew are forced back onto an old lease. Jacqui and Andrew get separated at night in far north Queensland. S8, Ep15

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: To increase gold production, the Gold Devils attempt to run three machines at once. The Gold Retrievers set a one-week ultimatum to find 10 ounces of gold. S8, Ep16

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: I Can't Breathe. Larina is on the verge of losing custody of her child due to her hoarding. But when confronted to let go of her clutter, her compulsion threatens to win the battle. S3, Ep9

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Tiny Monsters. Sherry's hoard has broken up her marriage. Now, authorities are threatening to take away her children and condemn her home. Can she break her bad habits? S3, Ep10

programme.desc: Great White Shark And Grizzly Bear. A man reveals how he was nearly torn in half by a great white shark. Another man shares how his face was destroyed by a 700lb grizzly bear. S1, Ep2

programme.title: I Was Bitten
programme.desc: Taipan Snake And Mountain Lion. Using cutting-edge medical advancements, skilled doctors piece back together the body of a man who survived a deadly mountain lion attack. S1, Ep3

programme.desc: Brand new series: Kristina Goodsell hosts an orange-themed party, with a set from her fave DJ. No red flags here, just one guest dressed as a traffic cone! But who's won the week? (Ep5/5)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The programmes being watched this time include This Morning, Boris Johnson's Ministerial Broadcast, Hospital: Fighting Covid-19, and Netflix's After Life.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Luke, who's lost his dating mojo, is raring to re-invigorate his love life and find a lady to relight his fire. And can pole dancer Abi find someone to send her heart into a spin?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: 24 Minutes: In a parody of the action series 24, Bart and Lisa must stop bullies releasing a stink bomb at school.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Chips and Salsa: When Haley hears that her boss is looking for a product with the magical properties of peppers, she tries to convince Gloria to sell her salsa.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Jump: When Tina receives unexpected news, Calvin, Dave and Gemma encourage her to embrace it.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Standoff: A surprise delivery prompts Dave and Gemma to examine the power dynamics in their relationship.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Speed Bump: Dave and Calvin try to make their community safer.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Hip-Shaking and Booty-Quaking: Erica and Geoff decide to throw a party to prove that they can still have fun as a young, engaged couple.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Kissing Bandits: When they return home from college orientation, Adam and Brea each confess secrets that could affect the future of their relationship.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Peck of Familial Love: Geoff and Joanne's Valentine's celebration sets an uncomfortable example for the Goldbergs.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Steve Weekend: Barry comes face-to-face with his ex-girlfriends and their boyfriends during Erica and Geoff's joint bachelor/bachelorette party.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Wedding: On the eve of her wedding, Erica rebels against Beverly's over-the-top plans for the big day.

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: A furious Yas accuses Beks of betraying her with Sam Prince. Sparks re-ignite between Livvy and Chuggs. And can Demi and Jules build bridges for Jazz's sake?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Return to Amy's Baking Company: Gordon revisits the most contentious restaurant he's ever tried to rescue - Amy's Baking Company, in Scottsdale, Arizona.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Pantaleone's: In Colorado, Gordon visits Italian restaurant Pantaleone's, whose stubborn owner Pete claims that he makes 'the best pizza in Denver'. Sadly, Gordon doesn't agree.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: La Galleria 33 (Part 2/2): The saga of Boston eatery La Galleria 33 comes to a dramatic conclusion as Gordon Ramsay gives restaurant owners and sisters Rita and Lisa an ultimatum.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Mama Maria's: Gordon Ramsay visits Mama Maria's, a failing restaurant in Brooklyn, New York, where owner John is overwhelmed by running a business that's become stuck in the past.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Maternal Combustion: Personalities collide when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet. Howard decides to 'man up' and do his share of the housework.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Commitment Determination: Sheldon pressures Leonard and Penny to choose a date for their wedding while dealing with changes in his own relationship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Matrimonial Momentum: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman. Sheldon doesn't know how to act when Amy breaks up with him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Separation Oscillation: Sheldon films a special post-break-up episode of Fun with Flags. Bernadette feels guilty about withholding a secret from Penny.

programme.title: The Great New Year Bake Off
programme.desc: Grab a dram, as Scottish bakers from across the years celebrate Hogmanay in the tent! Whose Technical will fall short? And whose cranachan will see them crowned as 2025's first star baker?

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: (2019) Animated spy comedy caper with the voice of Will Smith. The 'world's most awesome spy' gets framed and has to go undercover as a pigeon to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: You Kent Always Say What You Want: After spilling coffee on his lap, Kent Brockman swears on live TV and gets fired. So Kent and Lisa team up to broadcast inconvenient truths.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kamp Krusty: Bart fakes his school report so that Homer will let him and Lisa go to Kamp Krusty. But the summer camp turns out to be a sweatshop and Bart leads an uprising...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Streetcar Named Marge: Homer's boorishness inspires Marge to give the performance of a lifetime in a musical version of A Streetcar Named Desire.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer the Heretic: Homer has a vision from God and decides to start his own religion, which doesn't go down too well with the neighbours.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa the Beauty Queen: Lisa wins second place in a beauty contest.

programme.title: Gogglebox Festive Special
programme.desc: Britain's favourite armchair critics review 2024's Christmas TV, from Strictly to Gavin & Stacey, First Dates, Hot Frosty, Bullseye, The Dog House, Is It Cake? and Fanny Cradock.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers tune in to Gladiators, Is It Cake?, Casualty, The 1% Club, The Yorkshire Farm, This Morning, BBC News on the cost of living, and more.

programme.title: Bob Trevino Likes It
programme.desc: (2024) Tracie Laymon's bitter-sweet comedy drama stars Barbie Ferreira as a young woman who meets a man with the same name as her useless father and spots the opportunity for a reset...

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Smallest Show On Earth
programme.desc: (1957) Comedy with Bill Travers and Virginia McKenna as a couple who inherit a dilapidated fleapit cinema, along with its equally dilapidated staff: Peter Sellers, Margaret Rutherford.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: (1945) Five uncanny tales of the supernatural in one eerie package, the most famous starring ventriloquist Michael Redgrave and a deadly dummy. Prepare to be spooked.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: (1965) A spin-off of the cult television series starring Peter Cushing. Backyard-inventor Dr Who finds himself stuck on the irradiated planet Skaro, home of the cold and metallic Daleks.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: (1995) Mel Gibson stars in this Oscar-laden epic as William Wallace - Scottish freedom fighter, rousing orator and keen face painter - who led his army into England, threatening the throne.

programme.title: The Mission
programme.desc: (1986) Award-winning epic with Robert De Niro and Jeremy Irons. A Jesuit priest and a reformed slave trader forge an alliance to protect Indigenous South Americans from colonial Portugal.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: (1967) Julie Christie and Terence Stamp star in John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's novel. Bathsheba is not short of suitors, but will marrying any of them lead to happiness?

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: (2022) It's Predator, 1719 style. Amber Midthunder stars as a Comanche hunter who must save her tribe from an extraterrestrial threat in this action prequel. If it bleeds, you can kill it.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: (2011) Sci-fi horror-comedy with John Boyega. Aggressive aliens unwisely pick a tough London estate as the beachhead for their invasion. But the locals are no pushovers...

programme.title: Save Yourselves!
programme.desc: (2020) Gentle apocalypse comedy with Sunita Mani and John Reynolds. An NYC hipster couple go cold turkey from their tech in the sticks. But while they're off grid, cute furry aliens invade.

programme.title: Lola
programme.desc: (2022) Lo-fi sci-fi. In 1940, two sisters invent a contraption that intercepts future broadcasts. But it inadvertently creates an alternate timeline in which the Nazis win the war. Oops.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Kid Who Would Be King
programme.desc: (2019) Fantasy adventure. A 12-year-old from modern-day suburbia finds King Arthur's sword Excalibur and must save the country from a sinister sorceress. With Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: (1984) John Carpenter's sci-fi romance with Jeff Bridges and Karen Allen. An alien is stranded on Earth, where he assumes the form of a widow's dead husband - and finds the locals hostile.

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: (1994) Festive family drama. Richard Attenborough stars as a department store Santa who insists he's the real Santa Claus. But can he prove it in court?

programme.title: Le Mans '66
programme.desc: (2019) Oscar-winning sports drama starring Matt Damon and Christian Bale. In the 60s, Ford set out to build a car that can defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans race.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: (2020) Groundhog day shoot 'em up with Frank Grillo, Naomi Watts and Mel Gibson. Ray gets killed every day. Can he escape by unravelling the mystery of why a bunch of people want him dead?

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: (2002) Scorsese's epic drama with Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel Day-Lewis and Cameron Diaz. As gang warfare dominates 1860s New York, an orphan seeks revenge against his father's killer.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: (2002) Action-thriller starring Jason Statham. For a price, an underworld courier will deliver people or packages anywhere, no questions asked. But one job lands him in deep danger.

programme.desc: Goodbye Campers: Get ready for summer cubs' release with Roger, then meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two sick newbies staying with the Z cubs this winter. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World
programme.desc: Eat or be Eaten: See why the terrifying praying mantis has the agility of a martial artist and an appetite for everything from flies to hummingbirds. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Britain's Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Killer Women - Tracie Andrews: A profile of the former aspiring model who stabbed her fiance 42 times, before blaming the attack on a fictional road rage assailant.

programme.title: World's Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Ted Bundy: A look at the life - and horrifying crimes - of Ted Bundy, a notorious serial killer who murdered at least 30 young women and girls between 1974 and 1978.

programme.title: FILM: Unhinged
programme.desc: After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage. Russell Crowe stars in this action thriller. (2020)

programme.title: FILM: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
programme.desc: Sky Cinema original exploring the horrific crimes of serial killer Ted Bundy, told from the perspective of his girlfriend. Zac Efron and Lily Collins star.
